creator: elanon@terra.es
text:
After installing php 4.2.2 or 4.2.3 and editing httpd.conf with the lines

LoadModule php4_module C:/Apache/php/sapi/php4apache2.dll
AddType application/x-httpd-php .php4 .php
AddType application/x-httpd-php-source .phps

Apache will not start, restart, or boot as service or manually.

Versions tested: 2.0.42 and 2.0.43 of apache ( msi and exe stable 
distributions )
Versions tested: 4.2.2 and 4.2.3 of php ( current stable distribution )
OS: Windows XP pro mounted on ntfs filesystem

Windows event syslog reports that:

Cannot load C:/Apache/php/sapi/php4apache2.dll into server: Impossible to 
locate the specified procedure.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
You are using a php4apache2 filter compiled for an earlier release of
  Apache.  You must use a module built for Apache 2.0.42 or 2.0.43.
